rooms.description: Traditional Kerala-style living room with wooden furnishings and ample natural light.
Open dining area adjacent to the kitchen, designed for communal gatherings.
Modern yet traditional Kerala kitchen with stone countertops and tiled floors.
Guest bedroom with traditional decor and ample storage space.
Second guest bedroom designed in Kerala style with local textiles.
Shared bathroom for the ground floor, incorporating traditional Kerala tiles and fixtures.

openings.description: Interior door leading to the guest rooms.

levels.level_description: The ground floor features a traditional Kerala living space with open areas for social gatherings and dining, aligned with Vastu principles by emphasizing natural light from the east. The layout encourages positive energy flow and seamless connectivity between spaces, while maintaining privacy for private areas such as bathrooms.
